content.name: info
content.content:
(Shrewsbury & Telford NHS Trust)


Commissioned to allow cancer patients to manage their own condition and hospital records in whichever way best suits them. Featuring resources, easy-to-understand diagnosis explanations, symptoms/mood/appointment diary and messaging functionality to their care team, this app works from both patient & clinician perspectives.
